original_text: Abram understood that the kings had caught his nephew. So he called 318 men to come together. These men had been born in Abram's camp and they knew how to fight. Abram took his men with him. They went to attack the men who had caught Lot. They went as far as Dan.
korean_text: 아브람이 그의 조카가 사로잡혔음을 듣고 집에서 길리고 훈련된 자 삼백십팔 명을 거느리고 단까지 쫓아가서

sentences.original_text: Abram understood that the kings had caught his nephew.
sentences.korean_translation: 아브람은 왕들이 그의 조카를 붙잡았다는 것을 이해했습니다.

sentences.original_text: So he called 318 men to come together.
These men had been born in Abram's camp.
and they knew how to fight.
Abram took his men with him.
They went to attack the men who had caught Lot.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 롯을 붙잡은 남자들을 공격하러 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They went as far as Dan.
